trends: There have been no other sightings in Shawnigan Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 huge glowing orbs seemed to come through portal 1 after another changing to small redish yellow and moving zig/zag independantly.
divs: sighting detailsform would not allow me to select a required province for submition so i changed location to usa\washington. i have a small shop beside my house and i was puttering and watching youtube videos. i went outside for a smoke at about 11:15 pm on june 8 2013 and as i stood looking toward the southwest 1 big blueish orb seemed to appear out of nowhere. another one came out about 2 seconds later and then a 3rd one maybe 5 seconds after that. i shook my head trying to make sense of what i was seeing. they appeared to be huge semi-transparrent blueish\white bubbles with a very bright white core. as they descended, (they appeared to enter in a downward direction coming out of what faintly looked like a misty river portal), they levelled out heading north and after maybe 20 seconds they all changed into smaller star-like redish\orange balls; the larger orbs seemed to turn off leaving the small center part. at this point i was trying to get a camera working but both cameras had dead batteries. i tried to get footage with my cell camera but i do not know yet if i got any footage, i am not hopefull with the cell. i watched as 1 zig-zaged in every direction effortlessly. i then called a neighbour to try get someone else to see this. by the time the neighbour looked the objects had moved away behing thick trees to the northwest. thats it in a nutshell i guess. this was awesome!
